snippet: The transit officer was stabbed in the eye at the Jamaica Station of the Long Island Rail Road; his assailant was killed, the M.T.A. said.
abstract: The transit officer was stabbed in the eye at the Jamaica Station of the Long Island Rail Road; his assailant was killed, the M.T.A. said.

headline.main: Transit Officer Is Stabbed in Queens
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Officer, Stabbed in Left Eye, Kills Attacker Who Kept Coming at Him
